name: members

interface.description: Interface names. "interface" param take precedence over "zone" or "sla". If set, will return only return the members that matches the interfaces.

zone.description: SD-WAN zone name. "zone" param take precedence over "sla". If set, will only return members of the zone.

sla.description: SLA name. If set, will only return members that are participants of the SLA.

skip_vpn_child.description: If set, will skip all VPN child interfaces.

GET.summary:
Retrieve interface statistics for each SD-WAN link.
Access Group: netgrp.cfg

help: Retrieve interface statistics for each SD-WAN link.

interface.name: interface
interface.title: Interface
interface.description: The interface name of the SD-WAN member.

seq_num.name: seq_num
seq_num.title: Sequence Number
seq_num.description: The sequence number of an SD-WAN member.

status.name: status
status.title: Status
status.description: Status of traffic monitoring. If this value is present, traffic monitoring is not enabled and other statistics will be absent.

link.name: link
link.title: Link Status
link.description: Interface link status for the SD-WAN member.

session.name: session
session.title: Session Count
session.description: Session count for the SD-WAN member.

tx_bytes.name: tx_bytes
tx_bytes.title: Bytes Sent
tx_bytes.description: Amount of data transmitted by the SD-WAN member, in bytes.

rx_bytes.name: rx_bytes
rx_bytes.title: Bytes Received
rx_bytes.description: Amount of data received by the SD-WAN member, in bytes.

tx_bandwidth.name: tx_bandwidth
tx_bandwidth.title: Upload Bandwidth
tx_bandwidth.description: Upload bandwidth of the SD-WAN member, in bits per second.

rx_bandwidth.name: rx_bandwidth
rx_bandwidth.title: Download Bandwidth
rx_bandwidth.description: Download bandwidth of the SD-WAN member, in bits per second.

state_changed.name: state_changed
state_changed.title: Last State Change
state_changed.description: Timestamp of the last link state change, in seconds.

child_intfs.name: child_intfs
child_intfs.title: Child Interface
child_intfs.description: The dynamic tunnel of the SD-WAN member.

response_description: A list of SD-WAN members and their traffic statistics.

interface.name: interface
interface.summary: Interface names. "interface" param take precedence over "zone" or "sla". If set, will return only return the members that matches the interfaces.

zone.name: zone
zone.summary: SD-WAN zone name. "zone" param take precedence over "sla". If set, will only return members of the zone.

sla.name: sla
sla.summary: SLA name. If set, will only return members that are participants of the SLA.

skip_vpn_child.name: skip_vpn_child
skip_vpn_child.summary: If set, will skip all VPN child interfaces.
